description:
Starting from our very own selves, we will collectively observe, translate and communicate many things, in a series of different ways and projects.As Pythagoras once said, “Man is the measure of all things”. It is the main reason we focus on “ourselves” in this first part of Design 1o1 Redux.To do so, we will work with all kinds of cool apps for phones and tablets (do you have a smartphone or tablet?). We will also share our works with the others on Instagram, using special hashtags.Indeed, we will explore a new way to learn a new design.

                                            Syllabus
                        Week 1: My BodyWeek 2: My MindWeek 3: My TimeWeek 4: My DiaryWeek 5: My FoodWeek 6: My ClothesWeek 7: My ExamWeek 8: My Break
title: Design 1o1 Redux - Part 1: Myself
